actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the addition of Sailors Snug Harbor to Gateway National Recreation Area in the State of New York, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Revises the boundaries of the Gateway National Recreation Area to include Sailors Snug Harbor, located in the City of New York.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the addition of Sailors Snug Harbor to Gateway National Recreation Area in the State of New York, and for other purposes.
